mapper.insert: insert into weizu_oa_sign_shift( name, team_id, start_time, work_hour, end_time, start_limit, end_limit, create_time ) values ( #{name}, #{teamId}, #{startTime}, #{workHour}, #{endTime}, #{startLimit}, #{endLimit}, now() )
mapper.update: update weizu_oa_sign_shift set modify_time=now(), name = #{name}, team_id = #{teamId}, start_time = #{startTime}, work_hour = #{workHour}, end_time = #{endTime}, start_limit = #{startLimit}, end_limit = #{endLimit}, modify_time = #{modifyTime} where id = #{id}
mapper.select: select t.id, t.name as name, t.team_id as teamId, t.start_time as startTime, t.work_hour as workHour, t.end_time as endTime, t.start_limit as startLimit, t.end_limit as endLimit, t.create_time as createTime, t.modify_time as modifyTime from weizu_oa_sign_shift as t where id = #{id}
